snippet: Turkey’s past is no model for a democratic future. Earlier leaders, including Ataturk, were just as authoritarian as Erdogan.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Prof Edhem Eldem maintains Turkey's history has little to offer in terms of democratic inspiration, something current protest movement would do well to remember; contends Turkey's leaders and protesters need to understand that true secular democracy is only viable way to guarantee rights and freedoms of all citizens.
lead_paragraph: Turkey’s past is no model for a democratic future. Earlier leaders, including Ataturk, were just as authoritarian as Erdogan.
